titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain sleeping bags.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
3/5/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain sleeping bags.
